name: Star Wars: Jedi Stephen's Revenge
description:
Star Wars: Jedi Stephen's Revenge 

Explore the galaxy in an all new Star Wars fan game/parody! 
Order 66 is upon the galaxy! Jedi knights Kayto Fosin and Moses-Gon-Jin are on they're way back to Coruscant from a war campaign on Ryloth when their Ship is intercepted by the evil Darth Stephen who reveals his plot to take over the galaxy. 

Features include:

• Fully voice acted dialogue

• Action packed levels

• Engaging storyline

And much more...

Disclaimer: This game uses profanity in its dialogue and may not be suitable for children. May also contain Canonical inaccuracies and buggy gameplay and flashy lights.

In honor of our friend Tony.

Dedicated to the Kotor Aperion project
